H0.text: Who was the first US-born winner of golf's British Open. Bobby Jones

H1.text: Who was the first US-born winner of golf's British Open. Gene Sarazen

H2.text: Who was the first US-born winner of golf's British Open. Francis Ouimet

H3.text: Who was the first US-born winner of golf's British Open. Walter Hagen

A4.text: Sarazen won the Open Championship in 1932.
